name: The Holy Wire
description:
This game was made in 72 hours

Your power is your music

Creators :

Arda Kurt - Game Developer

Engin Can Altınoz - Game Developer

İsmail Abay- Pixel Artist

Controls :

A-D - Move

W - Jump

Space or Mouse Left - Attack

Q - Double Jump

Assets :

Music :

  1. Lord Of The Dawn - Jesse Gallagher
  2. To Ponder - Godmode
  3. Calcutta Sunset - E's Jammy Jams
  4. Feels - Patrick Patrikios
  5. MadRooster Sound Library 2022

---------------------------------------------------------------------

Bu oyun 72 saatte yapılmıstır.

Senin gücün müziğin
